Excellent Everything was great at this hotel. We recommend.

direccion: Av. Naciones Unidas, and Av. Republica de El Salvador, Quito, Pichincha

comentarios.comentario: Excellent Very clean property and rooms. Outstanding staff also.

Good Hotel is in a great location for restaurants, mall and close to a large park. The gym weights could do with upgrading but has the essentials. Food is not great in the hotel but, there is lots  of choice outside.
Excellent Property was centrally located on a safe to walk at night street and the staff was very helpful and polite.
Excellent 🤗

Good Amazing service and staff friendliness.
Not so good food

Excellent Many hotels in Quito did fancy interiors much better than Sheraton. But if you are looking for a quiet, safe, convenient, and friendly hotel, I definitely recommend Sheraton. I think Sheraton did basic systems much better than other hotels. I believe the good things are not visible, but you can feel them. The room is quiet, and the clothes dry fast...all these mean the construction team might add enough insulation for each demising wall and exterior so I can feel a comfortable environment. Also, the internet is fast. That supports me to work remotely. Sheraton staff are very professional, helpful, and friendly.
Okay I would recommend the hotel- it is clean and well located- but it didn’t have a great vibe.

Excellent I like the staff es the best , the person who clean the room very good the bottoms, the people at the door excellent, all the staff well training.
thanks for all your love
Excellent The staff is fantastic
Good

direccion: Calle Bolívar OE 6-41 & Cuenca, Quito, Pichincha

comentarios.comentario: Terrible I tried to cancel an airport pick up 4 days in advance and was declined. Still had to pay $100.00 for a &30.00 cab ride.
Excellent I have stayed at places all over the world. This Hotel is top of the food chain.you can ask them for anything they find away to get it done. This place on all levels is a 10.

Excellent This Hotel is phenomenal. Perfectly located in the heart of Quito historic district. Hotel is fully renovated and staff is very friendly. Food in the restaurant is delicious. Café quiteño experience between 4-6pm at the lobby area is great!

Excellent The stay was incredible! The staff was extremely attentive and helpful. The breakfast and dinner were great, the room was clean and nice and we got a lovey bottle of champagne in our room with a nice card. The garden area in the hotel as well as the roof top view were fantastic.
Good Best place in town

Excellent Everything about our stay was wonderful! Casa Gangotena used to be a mansion and it is beautiful! The service was top notch. Everyone from valet to front desk to the restaurant was sooo nice and helpful. The food at the restaurant we good as well. I know it’s on the pricier side compared to other hotels but if you are looking for a beautiful place to stay with great service look no further.
Excellent Beautiful Colonial and elegant.  Location amazing!! Staff Amazing!! Never said No!!!
Good
Excellent
Excellent Great location , great rooms and great service

comentarios.comentario: Terrible Sucia la habitación

Terrible Estuve 2 noches; la primera los dispensadores de shampoo y jabon líquido vacíos y la cafetera no funcionaba; la segunda noche terrible sucia mi habitación; llena de cabellos en el baño y la alfombra ….. I stayed 2 nights;  the first the empty shampoo and liquid soap dispensers and the coffee maker did not work;  the second night terrible dirty my room;  full of hair in the bathroom and the carpet
Excellent Buen hotel bien cuidado, excelente desayuno. Quizás deben mejorar un poco el estado de las duchas.
Excellent
Excellent Nice hotel, staff was super friendly and always available.
Good
Excellent

Okay Overall, the hotel is nice and located in a good area. I didn't like the fact that I couldn't control the air conditioning from my room, I had to call and ask to turn on/off the air conditioning. Also, the shower would constantly go from cold to hot water during a shower. I have stayed at this hotel before, I didn't have these issues. I hope they get them taken care of.
Excellent Friendly staff
Excellent

direccion: República de El Salvador, N34-349 e Irlanda, Quito, Quito

comentarios.comentario: Good It’s very clean. Rooms are up to date. Highly recommend staying at this property. Little construction being done around the area.

Excellent This hotel was beautiful! I think it is the prettiest hotel I've ever stayed at with wonderful views of the city. It was also within waking distance to cool restaurants. The staff was all very helpful and friendly. I loved it!
Okay A nice place. There was an disagreeable smell in the elevators and too much air freshener being used.
Excellent The hotel location was great. The hotel was exceptional & would definitely stay here again. Everyone was very courteous & attentive.

Excellent Everything was great. Front desk got us excellent private tour guides within five minutes. Alex, the bartender was very friendly and hospitable. The location was wonderful. Highly recommend this hotel.

Poor Although the rooms are beautiful they should warn you when you book that there is a construction going on to expand the hotel, construction that is in very early stages. The noise early in the morning was an impediment to rest properly, also the windows are paper thin and you can hear everything from the rooftop (music, people laughing) I also went to the spa and got a lymphatic massage which was pretty good. I got an express facial which consisted on my routine at night time!!! Cleanser, tonic, mask and moisturizer. I got a body scrub which was a complete joke as well. I got room service for all my breakfasts and one dinner and it was quick and fantastic. See more
Good
Excellent buena ubicación para caminar, pero si tiene vehículo puede ser muy complicado
Okay Bathroom needs to be more clean… the ceiling has moho.
Excellent Great location, beautiful room.  The only negative was the construction going on.  Started too early and was very loud.

Excellent Excelente ubicación.  Lss facilidades son muy bonitas y están en excelente estado.

Excellent Great location and wonderful staff. Good breakfast too. I would stay here again. It can be slightly noisy from other guests in the main areas, but traffic noise and noise from other rooms was really minimal. I'm a light sleeper and slept fine.
Excellent excelent

Excellent Hotel Filandia is a great hotel. Our room was spacious and nice. The breakfast was tasty with many delicious options. The staff was courteous and very helpful. The location is great. It is one block away from parque La Carolina which is beautiful. There are many restaurants and cafes  close by. It was a great stay and I fully recommend this hotel!

nombre_id: Old Town Quito Suites, Apartments & Boutique hotel
direccion: José de Antepara E3-61 y Vicente Léon, San Blas, Quito, Pichincha, 170136

comentarios.nombreh_id: Old Town Quito Suites, Apartments & Boutique hotel
comentarios.comentario: Excellent This is a beautiful hotel. I highly recommend this to any traveler looking for a bit of relaxation in a busy city. The space is beautifully decorated and very clean. The little touches like fresh bread every morning, stocked fridge and coffee make the space special. The staff and owner, Joz, Edison, Jhon and Dirk, are lovely people and incredibly kind. Very communicate and offer great suggestions where to visit and eat. Next time I visit, I will definitely stay here again.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Old Town Quito Suites, Apartments & Boutique hotel
comentarios.comentario: Excellent Yo ha viajado mucho los pasados 20 años. Old Town Quito Hotel es el mejor apartamento que ha tenido. Cada vez que regreso al Quito voy quedar en Oid Town Quito Hotel. Excelente y extrodinario!

comentarios.nombreh_id: Old Town Quito Suites, Apartments & Boutique hotel
comentarios.comentario: Excellent Staff wee so friendly and made sure everything was good and smooth. Room was very very large and comfortable and full breakfast ingredients were also provided to cook in the kitchen.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Old Town Quito Suites, Apartments & Boutique hotel
comentarios.comentario: Excellent Excelente ubicación. Una estructura antigua hermosa y el trato del staff a otro nivel. Definitivamente volvemos!

comentarios.nombreh_id: Old Town Quito Suites, Apartments & Boutique hotel
comentarios.comentario: Excellent Superb hotel and 5-star customer service!

comentarios.nombreh_id: Old Town Quito Suites, Apartments & Boutique hotel
comentarios.comentario: Excellent Spacious well equipped suite with separate living room and kitchen in beautifully restored building next to the historic centre. A very comfortable base for exploring Quito at a reasonable price.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Old Town Quito Suites, Apartments & Boutique hotel
comentarios.comentario: Excellent This hotel was perfect for our family of four! The suites are very spacious and well decorated. The staff is extremely nice and helpful. The fridge is stocked every day with breakfast items, which was a very nice touch. There are several restaurants on that street and the heart of old town is just a quick walk away. Amazing place which I highly recommend!

comentarios.comentario: Excellent Stay for a night and it was amazing. The room was spacious and clean. I would definitely stay here again next time visiting Quito.

direccion: Pasaje Stubel Nro. 1 y León Larrea, Quito, Pichincha, 2460

comentarios.comentario: Good A park next to the hotel has become a youth hang out and tend to stay to early morning hours partying. the hotel upgraded me to a suite away from the park at no extra charge. which my wife are very grateful.
Good Very nice hotel and friendly staff
Good Convenient location for my purposes.

Poor I got a room that faces an area where young people gather at night, drinking, and being loud. I wasn’t able to sleep the entire night.
The room smell like cigarettes smoke, I complained about it. I was told it is a nonsmoking room, and it may be someone on the next room smoking. My problem wasn’t resolved.

Poor The hotel view is spectacular, unfortunately is outdated in term of room amenities. The Internet is rarely working, if so its very slow. Main entrance doors are always locked and only the receptionist can unlock it which I find it inconvenient although there is a security person on site I don't see a need for that.
Good Very nice area and staff very friendly
Good Nice view
Excellent Un lugar mágico y hermoso lo repetiría mil veces, el desayuno riquísimo, la vista asombrosa, todo su personal súper educado y amable, muchas gracias
Excellent

Good Staff at front desk could have been a little more friendly/helpful. Breakfast is included but they serve the same food everyday. Pillows are not the best.  Other than that this is a nice place for the price.

direccion: Sucre Oe 3-17 y Guayaquil, Centro Histórico, Quito

comentarios.comentario: Excellent Beautiful traditional architecture and decor. Very close to the main square and in a very clean area. Breakfast was good.
Good Loved the quiet ambiance. The power outlets are very loose so the connection with our chargers is weak.
Excellent
Excellent
Excellent
Excellent This is my second time staying at this hotel and it has been awesome both times.  The staff are so friendly and helpful.

Excellent This refurbished Colonial home with interior courtyard was wonderful for our first trip to Quito. In fact we stayed on the way to the Gallapagos & on the way back. All the staff was very helpful and breakfast of fruit eggs & fresh bread was included. One warning, no elevator, & some rooms are on the 5th or 6th level! The view from the rooftop deck was amazing. They were also very accommodating to change our rooms to the 2nd floor when we asked. I would definitely stay again. The airport transportation was also inexpensive & reliable.See more
Excellent
Excellent Great hotel & location! Nice staff & would stay here again. Highly recommend!

Good The place is awesome. The location is incredible. And the hotel is in good shape. But the service was awful, they offer you a simple breakfast where you are not able to ask for something different than scramble eggs, not even sunny side of or a tortilla. The staff does not show the hotel around and they make it look as it is a place to crush. It is one of the most beautiful places to stay at the center of Quito. But all the crew do not care about it. They don’t even tell you what places can you visit or where to eat since they close their beautiful dinning room for the whole day. It is really sad to see a place with such an amazing potencial to be left like a place to only spend the night. See more

comentarios.comentario: Excellent I stayed at the Fenix hotel with my family. We have a great experience, the attention of the staff was excellent, the hotel was clean as well as our rooms. I'll be back in the future!

Okay The hotel itself was nice but our room was old looking and needs an update, especially the bathroom. The water ran extremely hot to extremely cold. We only stayed one night as this was not our only destination.

Terrible My fiancee came to pick me up at the hotel came to my room to wait for me to finish getting ready .and i was charge for an additional person in the room ,their explanation was that if she waited in the toom more than an hour even if she did not stay, i had to pay for her .when i first checked in i mentioned that my fiancee would be picking me up and they daid as long as she doesn't stay no problem. At check out they changed me for her.also metion we would have to sit in the lobby only for an hour .like in prison .no vents in rooms ,noise comes into rooms at all hours ,i was lucky if i got 3 hours sleep every night .also black mold in bathroom.See more

comentarios.comentario: Excellent Excellent staff

Terrible Premises are decently okay.   This is small Hotel that I don't understand how they received the Radisson Certification.     Staff is definitely the best asset in this Hotel... but,

Location is definitely the problem that is NOT disclose properly.    Hotel is located in the Main Avenue of a RED ZONE; - full of Crime (we spent one night that couldn't sleep), across the street was a Club with people partying all night long; - Noise was unbearable; - Police and Ambulances were active due of the Street fights 

We stayed at the room 1002 (10th floor) and we still can hear the activity happening at the surrounding

Simply dissatisfied and disappointed !!! 
Definitely not for the standards of any American Citizen See more
Poor Terrible noisy and smells so bad like a food at night when the restaurant is working
Excellent Ok

Excellent The location is very good, it allows you to move to the Historic Center, the El Ejilo and La Carolina Parks, and to other destinations in Quito and its surroundings to visit amazing locations. At night, the activity nuances the emotion of the day to rest comfortably. The hotel staff are very helpful people.
Excellent The location is great. the rooms are clean and spacious.
Good Breakfast is very basic, no proper ventilation in the rooms

Excellent Very helpful staff.  Promptly answered emails prior to the the stay and accommodations were made for our stay per our emails.  Attentive and courteous staff.  Very helpful and the room was quiet, clean just as shown.
Excellent It was fine. Located in an area with many bars. Great for young people. Service at front desk was very good. Breakfast was good
Excellent The staff so friendly, and the room so good!!

direccion: Mariana de Jesús E7-74 y La Pradera, (atrás de edificio telefónica), Quito

comentarios.comentario: Okay
Excellent Very well located , very clean and nice and friendly staff..
Excellent It can be hard to find the place for a taxi driver, so ask them for some help explaining where it is.
Excellent This is a American standard hotel.  One of the best that I stayed at while in Ecuador.  It's cheaper via online reservations or it will cost about $20 more a night.
Excellent Great staff, friendly and clean..Great location and lovely decor. Highly recommend!

Good Everything was great, the hotel is well located and is very artsy with a little art gallery. One thing to note is that there is no coffee/tea in the common area available while it’s listed as one of the amenities. Also I found the floor in the room to be a bit dirty and the shower is rather small. Also on Saturday night the music outside the hotel is quite loud until at least 2am. Overall it a great hotel with those small exceptions.
Excellent

Excellent Casa Q was a wonderful escape from reality. We arrived during the protests, so even though the outside world felt chaotic, we felt completely safe and comfortable during our stay there. In addition to the hotel being gorgeous, the staff there were so kind, helpful, and informative! Would highly recommend and would stay there again!
Excellent The workers were friendly and the place relaxing in many ways.
Excellent Casa Q is a stylish boutique hotel in an interesting part of Quito.  Nice alternative to the touristy old town but close enough that you can still visit.  Would highly recommend this hotel.
